name: Thunder Crash
description: Raijin sends a bolt of lightning crashing down at his ground target location damaging and mesmerizing enemies, while Raijin himself ascends into the sky. Shortly thereafter he crashing down at that location, doing a second burst of damage to all Enemies in the area.
stats: Lightning Damage: 20/25/30/35/40 (+20% of your magical power)
Thunder Damage: 40/50/60/70/80 (+20% of your magical power)
